title: Herb-Infused Bath Tea (Rose + Oats)
excerpt: A soothing bath tea blend of oats, rose petals, and calendula for nourishing, sensitive, or irritated skin.
content:
## What Is This Bath Tea?
A gentle, herbal bath infusion designed to soothe and nourish sensitive or irritated skin. Oats calm dryness, rose cools inflammation, and calendula supports healing.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Rose balances Pitta, calming heat and redness. Oats offer grounding for Vata-type dryness, while calendula supports gentle skin repair.

### Key Benefits
- Soothes sensitive, itchy, or irritated skin.
- Hydrates and softens during bath.
- Ideal for self-care rituals.

## Ingredients
- Dried oats
- Rose petals
- Calendula flowers

## Usage Instructions
- Fill the muslin bag with the blend, steep it in warm bathwater for 5 minutes, then soak for 15â€“20 minutes.

## Packaging
- Muslin sachet and resealable pouch for freshness.

## Safety & Consultation
- Patch-test if extremely sensitive. Avoid hot water for Pitta-prone skin.

## Why Choose This Bath Tea?
A gentle, aromatic, Ayurvedic bath ritual for calming body and mind.
